Description: Great value for 1 bedroom in the Beacon Hill Area! Just distance from Newbury Street, Northeastern University, Prudential Center, Fenway Park, Boston Commons, Copley Square, MBTA, Symphony Hall, and much more! -1 Bedroom -1 Bathroom -Renovated Kitchen -Natural Light -Large Windows -Dishwasher -Hardwood Floors -High Ceilings -Utilities Included Easy access through multiple T stops to plenty of shops, restaurants, parks, fitness centers and grocery stores.
